extendedInfo.description: Chinese Language HostessLet the beautiful women of Chinese Language Hostess accompany you on your travels and assist you with speaking and learning English whenever you desire. With high quality video and audio for over 500 Chinese phrases and words, quick search for easily finding any word, and of course our lovely Chinese Hostesses looking into your eyes and speaking each word, it is simply the most useful and best looking language app available!Do you ever wish when traveling you could have a companion at your side at all times that you could ask âHow do you say in Chineseâ¦..?â Or someone that could speak the local language for you? Your Language Hostess provides you with the exact phrases and words as you should pronounce them. In your spare time, let the Hostess teach you phrases and words you can then use on your own. If itâs a taxi driver, waitress or a special someone you need to speak to, simply let the Hostess do the talking for you.- Over 500 Chinese words and phrases each with Chinese Script, and English to Chinese Translation with Phonetic Pronunciation / Pinyin- High quality video and audio for every word and phrase- Quick search of all words and phrases so you donât have to spend time looking for what you need- Audio is perfect for headphones or over your Phone speakers- A variety of categories for every situation- Costume changes!- Works offline so you don't need to be connected to the Internet and pay international roaming charges when traveling

reviews.title: Add Zhuyin support.
reviews.comment: Traditional characters are needed to make this application, really super cool. / Add a more advanced interface. / And, put a different girl for each day of the week. / This one can be Monday.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Voice\'s too low
reviews.comment: I\'m Chinese actually, I think this app needs much improvement.Firstly, The lady\'s voice is too low ,I can hardly hear what she said. Secondly,This lady\'s face can\'t represent Chinese females ,She\'s ugly in  Chinese eyes.

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Low sound makes it impossible to practice.
reviews.author: khalid soofi
